examples.example: 我对计算机充满了浓厚的兴趣，它为我的学习和工作带来了极大的便利。

translate.english: I am full of strong interest in the computer, which has brought great convenience to my study and work.

examples.example: 计算机是人类智慧的结晶，它让我们的生活变得更加丰富多彩。

translate.english: The computer is the crystallization of human wisdom, which makes our life more rich and colorful.

examples.example: 计算机的广泛应用，让我们的沟通和信息共享变得更加高效便捷。

translate.english: The wide application of computers makes our communication and information sharing more efficient and convenient.
